issues.task: Business Loan with ITR and cash flow checks
issues.description: Process business loan applications with ITR verification, cash flow analysis, and business document validation.
Support multiple applicants for loans with combined income and liability calculations.
Provide real-time status tracking for loan applications (submitted, under review, approved, rejected, disbursed).
Generate personalized loan offers with interest rates, tenure options, and EMI calculations based on user profile and creditworthiness.
Integrate with credit bureaus to fetch credit scores and history for loan eligibility assessment.
Support collateral document upload and verification for secured loans with valuation workflows.
Verify applicant income through salary slips, bank statements, and ITR documents with automated validation.
Prevent duplicate loan applications from the same applicant across multiple channels and time periods.
Recalculate EMIs when users make part-payments or request tenure changes with updated amortization schedules.
Track missed EMI payments and trigger progressive collection workflows (reminders, notices, legal action).
Automatically classify and tag loans as NPAs based on payment default patterns and regulatory guidelines.
Manage internal and external collection agency coordination for overdue loan accounts.
Check and offer top-up loan eligibility for existing loan customers based on repayment history and current outstanding.
Support loan restructuring during financial crisis including moratorium periods and modified payment terms.
Generate detailed loan account statements showing payment history, outstanding balance, and upcoming EMIs.
Offer and manage loan protection insurance with premium calculations and claim processing integration.
Publish loan decision events for downstream notification and analytics services.
